ygData.subject: Predacon helping...
ygData.msgSnippet: Technosis turned on her commlink and set it to Testifier s frequency again. More bubbling and some whining. Hello? Who s that I hear? Technosis asks. Weight

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Technosis turned on her commlink and set it to Testifier's frequency again.=
 More bubbling and some whining.

"Hello? Who's that I hear?" Technosis ask=
s. Weight looks down and sees a commlink floating around. He grabs it up an=
d pours the juice from it.

"Hello? Hello? This is Weight, your old Pred pa=
l? Remember me?" Weight asks.

"Yes! I do. Serge ate you, right? Oh, my, yo=
ur alive! Did you kill him?" Technosis says.

"No! I'm inside of him, I nee=
d help!" Weight says.

"Is Testifier okay?" Technosis asks.

"No, he's dead=
. I wake up and find 2 dead bots on top of me, this is sickening and I'm st=
ill inside this cannibal!" Weight says.

"He's dead? Oh, what will happen n=
ext!?" Technosis cries out. There is a clanging sound, like a commlink bein=
g dropped from Weight's end.

"Oh, no, Land Mine? Are you still there? Don'=
t forget about your friend in here! If you were swallowed and being digeste=
d by a crazy bot I would come save you! Please, Land Mine! Come back!" Weig=
ht calls. No answer. Weight leans back to help his hurting back, trying to =
keep his head above water. Hardly any room, this guy wasn't that big, just =
big enough to eat somebody whole. Hours later Technosis picks up the commli=
nk.

"By the Matrix! I forgot about you! Are you still okay?" Technosis ask=
s.

"I'm as okay as a bot that was swallowed and being digested slowly for =
a few days would feel. I'm in pain and very cramped. Imagine it." Weight sa=
ys.

"I'm sorry, I'll try to help you, where are you? I mean, where is Serg=
e? Oops, never mind." Technosis says.

"No, wait! He's in water, I know bec=
ause I just got flooded a oment ago. He could have moved. But he has hiccup=
s and I'm bouncing around right now. Just trying to keep my head above wate=
r is what I'm doing, and trying to keep my eyes out of the acid." Weight sa=
ys.

"I'll find Serge, hang on, Weight!" Technosis says. She tells Psuedo a=
nd Atma and they go Serge hunting.

"I think I'm soup." Weight says with a =
sigh. He pushed Cave-In's body off of himself again and starts whining abou=
t how Serge should go on a botless diet...
